document_data.name: Temple of Torm
document_data.organizations: Organizations in the Temple of Torm (Orvyltar)
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Torm''' was a temple devoted to [[Torm]], the God of Duty, located in the city of [[Orvyltar]] in [[Ulgarth]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Given the high social standing of [[knight]]s in Ulgarth, the temple received many of the sworn warriors who paid homage to Torm. The king of Ulgarth even came to the temple to worship.
